title: Bag
body:
Why have you left your place?
The housekeepers will be home any moment now
[[Dude, we need to get out of here!|Bag1]]
[[Let's run away! It's all over the news. People are abandoning plastic!|Bag2]]

title: Bag1
body:
Why?
[[Ecologists are urging people to reduce the use of plastic and switch to reusable items|Bag11]]

title: Bag11
body:
I think it's YOUR problem buddy
I AM A REUSABLE ITEM !!
[[Please tell me, how many times they will use you? No one is everlasting!|Bag111]]
[[Do really want to be a bag till the end of your life?|B112]]

title: Bag111
body:
And where will you go?
[[Wherever, surely the World Behind The Door has a safe place for us!|Bag1111]]

title: Bag1111
body:
But first we need to deal with the stairs.
We can try to glide down!
<<add DialoguePopup Bag>>
Grab by my handles, little console!
<<switch DialoguePopup 2>>
<<close DialoguePopup 1>>

title: B112
body:
<<switch DialoguePopup 1>>
And who else could I be?
[[Whomever you want! I think, the World Behind The Door will without a doubt appreciate you|Bag112a]]

title: Bag112a
body:
<<switch DialoguePopup 0>>
Well..
I've got nothing to lose.
But, what about the stairs?
[[If we properly inflate you I think we could fly away!|Bag112b]]

title: Bag112b
body:
<<switch DialoguePopup 1>>
<<add DialoguePopup Bag>>
Seems like I've got nothing to lose!
<<switch DialoguePopup 2>>
<<close DialoguePopup 1>>

title: Bag2
body:
<<switch DialoguePopup 1>>
Should I feel threatend?
[[Maybe not yet, but sooner or later...|Bag21]]
[[Who knows...|Bags]]

title: Bag21
body:
<<switch DialoguePopup 0>>
<<add DialoguePopup Bag>>
T-Then I will go with you!
<<switch DialoguePopup 2>>
<<close DialoguePopup 1>>

title: Bags
body:
<<switch DialoguePopup 0>>
Well, it's better to run away than to risk staying here.
<<add DialoguePopup Bag>>
I will help you fly downstairs!
<<switch DialoguePopup 2>>
<<close DialoguePopup 1>>
